m_szDocTitle: Radio Flyer Introduces Electric Tesla For Kids, Starting At $499
m_szDocSumamry: Radio Flyer Introduces Electric Tesla For Kids, Starting At $499 February 17th, 2016 by Steve Hanley   Originally published on Gas2 . Radio Flyer is introducing an electric Tesla For Kids. Did you have a Radio Flyer wagon when you were a kid? I did. It was made of metal and I hauled everything in it from rocks and dirt to my Golden Retriever, Max. Radio Flyer has evolved, as every company must. These days, you see fat tired plastic Radio Flyers everywhere hauling sand toys to the nation’s beaches. Now, Radio Flyer has hooked up with Tesla Motors to create an electric Tesla For Kids.
